name: Little Test
description:
A game where you can change your size to solve a few challenges.

A device to change size has been created, they called it the "Stick of Size" and you have been chosen to test it.

Controls:

  • WASD - move
  • Space - jump
  • Mouse - look around
  • Left Mouse - pick up objects
  • E - interact with the stick of size
  • Shift - change size
